metadata.title: Movies Collection
metadata.description: Complete movie dataset with genres, cast, crew, and metadata for organizing your personal film library.

demo_data.name: Inception
demo_data.description: A skilled thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

metadata.plot: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief, the absolute best in the dangerous art of extraction, stealing valuable secrets from deep within the subconscious during the dream state, when the mind is at its most vulnerable. Cobb's rare ability has made him a coveted player in this treacherous new world of corporate espionage, but it has also made him an international fugitive and cost him everything he has ever loved. Now Cobb is being offered a chance at redemption. One last job could give him his life back but only if he can accomplish the impossible, inception.

demo_data.name: Mad Max: Fury Road
demo_data.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to flee from a cult leader and his army in an armored tanker truck.

metadata.plot: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken, and almost everyone is crazed fighting for the necessities of life. Within this world exist two rebels on the run who just might be able to restore order.

demo_data.name: Zootopia
demo_data.description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

metadata.plot: From the largest elephant to the smallest shrew, the city of Zootopia is a mammal metropolis where various animals live and thrive. When Judy Hopps becomes the first rabbit to join the police force, she quickly learns how tough it is to enforce the law.

demo_data.name: Hereditary
demo_data.description: A grieving family is haunted by tragedy and disturbing secrets when their secretive grandmother dies.

metadata.plot: A woman's life is turned upside down when her mother dies, leaving behind a mysterious inheritance that leads the family into a world of demonic possession and supernatural terror.

demo_data.name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
demo_data.description: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel, and his protégé Zero Moustafa.

metadata.plot: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel between the wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

demo_data.name: Parasite
demo_data.description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family and infiltrate their household by posing as unrelated, highly qualified individuals.

metadata.plot: The Kims - mother and father Chung-sook and Ki-taek, and their young adult offspring, son Ki-woo and daughter Ki-jung - are a poor family living in a shabby and cramped half-basement apartment in a busy lower working class commercial district of Seoul.

demo_data.name: No Country for Old Men
demo_data.description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

metadata.plot: A hunter's discovery of a drug deal gone wrong leads to a deadly chase across the Texas borderlands, pursued by the psychopathic killer Anton Chigurh and aging Sheriff Bell.

demo_data.name: La La Land
demo_data.description: A jazz pianist falls for an aspiring actress in Los Angeles while pursuing their dreams in the city of stars.

metadata.plot: Sebastian and Mia are drawn together by their common desire to do what they love. But as success mounts they are faced with decisions that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair.

demo_data.name: Pulp Fiction
demo_data.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

metadata.plot: A burger-loving hit man, his philosophical partner, a drug-addicted gangster's moll and a washed-up boxer converge in this sprawling, comedic crime caper.

demo_data.name: Free Solo
demo_data.description: Follow Alex Honnold as he attempts to become the first person to ever free solo climb Yosemite's 3,000-foot high El Capitan wall.

metadata.plot: Follow Alex Honnold as he attempts to become the first person to ever free solo climb Yosemite's 3,000-foot high El Capitan wall. With no ropes or safety gear, he completed arguably the greatest feat in rock climbing history.
